data.name: txtCrearUsuarioDb.Text
data.value: CREATE LOGIN ada369 WITH PASSWORD = 'softwarereal' GO Use BASEADA ; GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'ada369') BEGIN CREATE USER [ada369] FOR LOGIN [ada369] EXEC sp_addrolemember N'db_owner', N'ada369' EXEC master..sp_addsrvrolemember @loginame = N'ada369', @rolename = N'sysadmin' END; GO

data.name: txtCrear_procedimientos.Text
data.value:
USE [master]
IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [SisCob].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'enable' end GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET ANSI_NULLS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET ANSI_WARNINGS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET ARITHABORT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET AUTO_CLOSE OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET DISABLE_BROKER GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET RECOVERY FULL GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET MULTI_USER GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET DB_CHAINING OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET FILESTREAM( NON_TRANSACTED_ACCESS = OFF ) GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET TARGET_RECOVERY_TIME = 60 SECONDS GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET DELAYED_DURABILITY = DISABLED GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET ACCELERATED_DATABASE_RECOVERY = OFF GO EXEC sys.sp_db_vardecimal_storage_format N'SisCob', N'ON' GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET QUERY_STORE = OFF GO USE [SisCob] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Activacion] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Activacion]( [Id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [E] [varchar](max) NULL, [FA] [varchar](max) NULL, [FF] [varchar](max) NULL, [SERIAL] [varchar](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Activacion] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[AsistenciaCurso] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[AsistenciaCurso]( [IdAsistenciaCurso] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [IdUsuario] [int] NULL, [IdGrado] [int] NULL, [Cant_nino] [int] NULL, [Cant_nina] [int] NULL, [Fecha] [date] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_AsistenciaCurso] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [IdAsistenciaCurso] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[AsistenciaEstudiantes] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[AsistenciaEstudiantes]( [IdAsistencia] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Idgrado] [int] NULL, [Fecha] [date] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_AsistenciaEstudiantes] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [IdAsistencia] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Cursos] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Cursos]( [IdCurso] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Nombre_Curso] [varchar](max) NULL, [Idnivel] [int] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Cursos] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [IdCurso] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[DetalleNoAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DetalleNoAsistio]( [IdAsistencia] [int] NULL, [IdStudents] [int] NULL, [Excusa] [varchar](max) NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[DetalleSiAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DetalleSiAsistio]( [IdAsistencia] [int] NULL, [IdStudents] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Dispositivos] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Dispositivos]( [Id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Serial] [varchar](max) NULL, [Informacion] [varchar](max) NULL, [Estado] [varchar](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Dispositivos] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Empresa] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Empresa]( [Idempresa] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Nombre] [varchar](max) NULL, [Lema] [varchar](max) NULL, [Direccion] [varchar](max) NULL, [Telefono] [varchar](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Empresa] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Idempresa] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Niveles] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Niveles]( [IdNivel] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Nombre_Nivel] [varchar](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Niveles] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [IdNivel] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Students] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Students]( [Id_Estudiante] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Nombre_Completo] [varchar](max) NULL, [Nombre_padre_tutor] [varchar](max) NULL, [Nombre_madre] [varchar](max) NULL, [Numero_Contacto] [varchar](max) NULL, [Numero_Contacto2] [varchar](max) NULL, [Direccion] [varchar](max) NULL, [Fecha_Nacimiento] [date] NULL, [Id_curso] [int] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Students] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id_Estudiante] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Usuarios] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:22 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Usuarios]( [IdUsuario] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Nombre] [varchar](max) NULL, [Usuario] [varchar](max) NULL, [Pin] [varchar](max) NULL, [Correo] [varchar](max) NULL, [Rol] [varchar](max) NULL, [Icono] [image] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Usuarios] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [IdUsuario] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[AsistenciaEstudiantes] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_AsistenciaEstudiantes_Cursos] FOREIGN KEY([Idgrado]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Cursos] ([IdCurso]) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[AsistenciaEstudiantes] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_AsistenciaEstudiantes_Cursos] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Cursos] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Cursos_Niveles] FOREIGN KEY([Idnivel]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Niveles] ([IdNivel]) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Cursos] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Cursos_Niveles] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleNoAsistio] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleNoAsistio_AsistenciaEstudiantes] FOREIGN KEY([IdAsistencia]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AsistenciaEstudiantes] ([IdAsistencia]) ON DELETE CASCADE GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleNoAsistio] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleNoAsistio_AsistenciaEstudiantes] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleNoAsistio] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleNoAsistio_Students] FOREIGN KEY([IdStudents]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Students] ([Id_Estudiante]) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleNoAsistio] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleNoAsistio_Students] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleSiAsistio] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleSiAsistio_AsistenciaEstudiantes] FOREIGN KEY([IdAsistencia]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AsistenciaEstudiantes] ([IdAsistencia]) ON DELETE CASCADE GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleSiAsistio] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleSiAsistio_AsistenciaEstudiantes] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleSiAsistio] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleSiAsistio_Students] FOREIGN KEY([IdStudents]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Students] ([Id_Estudiante]) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DetalleSiAsistio] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_DetalleSiAsistio_Students] GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[AceptarSolicitudConexion] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[AceptarSolicitudConexion] @serial varchar(max) as begin update Dispositivos set Estado = 'CONFIRMADO' where Serial = @serial end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[ActualizarEstadoLicencia] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[ActualizarEstadoLicencia] @estado varchar(max) as update Activacion set E = @estado
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Editar_Asistencia_Curso] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create PROC [dbo].[Editar_Asistencia_Curso] @IdAsistencia int, @cantninos int, @cantninas int as begin
update AsistenciaCurso set Cant_nino = @cantninos, Cant_nina = @cantninas where IdAsistenciaCurso = @IdAsistencia
end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[editar_Cursos] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[editar_Cursos] @IdCurso As int, @Nombre_Curso As varchar(MAX), @IdNivel int As UPDATE Cursos Set
Nombre_Curso=@Nombre_Curso, Idnivel = @IdNivel Where IdCurso=@IdCurso
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[editar_Students] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[editar_Students] @Id_Estudiante As int, @Nombre_Completo As varchar(MAX), @Nombre_padre_tutor As varchar(MAX), @Nombre_madre As varchar(MAX), @Numero_Contacto As varchar(MAX), @Numero_Contacto2 As varchar(MAX), @Direccion As varchar(MAX), @Fecha_Nacimiento As varchar(MAX), @Id_curso As int As UPDATE Students Set
Nombre_Completo=@Nombre_Completo, Nombre_padre_tutor=@Nombre_padre_tutor, Nombre_madre=@Nombre_madre, Numero_Contacto=@Numero_Contacto, Numero_Contacto2=@Numero_Contacto2, Direccion=@Direccion, Fecha_Nacimiento=@Fecha_Nacimiento, Id_curso=@Id_curso Where Id_Estudiante=@Id_Estudiante
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[EditarActivacion] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[EditarActivacion] @e varchar(max), @fa varchar(max), @ff varchar(max), @s varchar(max) as if exists (select * from Activacion) update Activacion set E = @e,FA = @fa,FF = @ff,SERIAL = @s
else
Insert into Activacion(E,FA,FF,SERIAL) values(@e,@fa,@ff,@s)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[EditarUsuarios] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[EditarUsuarios] @iduser int, @nombre varchar(max), @usuario varchar(max), @pin varchar(max), @correo varchar(max), @rol varchar(max), @imagen image as
update Usuarios set Nombre = @nombre,Usuario= @usuario,Pin = @pin,Correo = @correo, Rol = @rol,Icono = @imagen where IdUsuario = @iduser
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Eliminar_Asistencia_editar] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Eliminar_Asistencia_editar] @idAsistencia int as begin delete from DetalleNoAsistio where IdAsistencia = @idAsistencia end begin delete from DetalleSiAsistio where IdAsistencia = @idAsistencia end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Eliminar_SolicitudConexion] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Eliminar_SolicitudConexion] @serial varchar(max) as delete from Dispositivos where Serial = @serial
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[eliminar_Students] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[eliminar_Students] @Id_Estudiante As int
As DELETE FROM Students WHERE Id_Estudiante=@Id_Estudiante
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[eliminar_usuario] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[eliminar_usuario] @idUser int as declare @username varchar(max) = (select Usuario from Usuarios where IdUsuario= @idUser)
if @username != 'admin' delete from Usuarios where IdUsuario = @idUser else raiserror('El usuario admin no se puede borrar, esto causaria error en el sistema',18,2)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[IndetificarExisteBaseDatos] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[IndetificarExisteBaseDatos] as select IdUsuario from Usuarios where Usuario = 'admin'
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Insertar_Asistencia_Curso] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Insertar_Asistencia_Curso] @Idusuario int, @Idgrado int, @cantninos int, @cantninas int, @fecha date as begin
if Exists(select IdGrado from AsistenciaCurso where IdGrado = @Idgrado and Fecha = @fecha ) raiserror('--',18,5)
else insert into AsistenciaCurso (IdUsuario,IdGrado,Cant_nino,Cant_nina,Fecha) values (@Idusuario,@Idgrado,@cantninos,@cantninas,@fecha)
end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[insertar_AsistenciaEstudiantes] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[insertar_AsistenciaEstudiantes] @Idgrado As int, @Fecha As date As begin if EXISTS (select * from AsistenciaEstudiantes where Idgrado = @Idgrado and Fecha = @Fecha) Raiserror('EXISTE',18,5) else INSERT INTO AsistenciaEstudiantes Values ( @Idgrado, @Fecha)
end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[insertar_Cursos] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[insertar_Cursos] @Nombre_Curso As varchar(MAX), @IdNivel int As if exists(Select * from Cursos where Nombre_Curso = @Nombre_Curso) raiserror('Existe',18,2)
else INSERT INTO Cursos Values ( @Nombre_Curso,@IdNivel) GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[insertar_DetalleNOAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[insertar_DetalleNOAsistio] @IdAsistencia As int, @IdStudents As int, @excusa varchar(max) As INSERT INTO DetalleNoAsistio Values (@IdAsistencia, @IdStudents,@excusa)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[insertar_DetalleSiAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[insertar_DetalleSiAsistio] @IdAsistencia As int, @IdStudents As int As INSERT INTO DetalleSiAsistio Values (@IdAsistencia, @IdStudents)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[insertar_Students] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[insertar_Students] @Nombre_Completo As varchar(MAX), @Nombre_padre_tutor As varchar(MAX), @Nombre_madre As varchar(MAX), @Numero_Contacto As varchar(MAX), @Numero_Contacto2 As varchar(MAX), @Direccion As varchar(MAX), @Fecha_Nacimiento As varchar(MAX), @Id_curso As int As INSERT INTO Students Values ( @Nombre_Completo, @Nombre_padre_tutor, @Nombre_madre, @Numero_Contacto, @Numero_Contacto2, @Direccion, @Fecha_Nacimiento, @Id_curso)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[InsertarEmpresaInstalacion] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[InsertarEmpresaInstalacion] @nombre varchar(max), @lema varchar(max), @direccion varchar(max), @telefono varchar(max) as begin delete from Empresa end begin insert into Empresa (Nombre,Lema,Direccion,Telefono) values (@nombre,@lema,@direccion,@telefono) end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[InsertarNiveles] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[InsertarNiveles] @Nombre varchar(max) as if exists(select * from Niveles where Nombre_Nivel = @Nombre) raiserror('Ya existe un nivel guardado con este nombre',16,5) else Insert Into Niveles(Nombre_Nivel) values (@Nombre)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[InsertarNivelesPorDefectos] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[InsertarNivelesPorDefectos] as delete from Niveles insert into Niveles(Nombre_Nivel) values ('INICIAL') insert into Niveles(Nombre_Nivel) values ('PRIMARIA') insert into Niveles(Nombre_Nivel) values ('SECUNDARIA')
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[InsertarSolicitudDispositivo] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[InsertarSolicitudDispositivo] @serial varchar(max), @Informacion varchar(max), @Estado varchar (max) as if exists(select * from Dispositivos where Serial = @serial and Estado = 'ESPERA') begin raiserror('EXISTE',18,5) end if exists(select * from Dispositivos where Serial = @serial and Estado = 'CONFIRMADO') begin raiserror('EXISTE',18,5) end if not exists(select * from Dispositivos where Serial = @serial) insert into Dispositivos values (@serial,@Informacion,@Estado)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[InsertarUsuarioAdmin] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[InsertarUsuarioAdmin] @pin varchar(max), @icono image as insert into Usuarios(Nombre,Usuario,Pin,Correo,Rol,Icono) values ('admin','admin',@pin,'-','admin',@icono)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[InsertarUsuarios] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[InsertarUsuarios] @nombre varchar(max), @usuario varchar(max), @pin varchar(max), @correo varchar(max), @rol varchar(max), @imagen image as
if exists(select Usuario from Usuarios where Usuario = @usuario) Raiserror('Ya existe un registro con este usuario, Por favor ingresa uno nuevo',18,2) else Insert into Usuarios (Nombre,Usuario, Pin, Correo,Rol,Icono) values(@nombre,@usuario,@pin, @correo,@rol,@imagen)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MigrarEstudiante] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MigrarEstudiante] @Idgrado int, @Idestudiante int as Begin Update Students set Id_curso = @Idgrado where Id_Estudiante = @Idestudiante end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[mostrar_Curso_por_id] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create PROC [dbo].[mostrar_Curso_por_id] @id int As Select Nombre_Curso FROM Cursos where IdCurso = @id
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[mostrar_Cursos] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[mostrar_Cursos] As Select * FROM Cursos
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Mostrar_id_curso_por_nombre] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Mostrar_id_curso_por_nombre] @name varchar(max) as begin select top 1 IdCurso from Cursos where Nombre_Curso = @name end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[mostrar_Students] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[mostrar_Students] @letra varchar(max) As begin Select top 50 Id_Estudiante,Nombre_Completo as [Nombre Estudiante], Nombre_padre_tutor as [Nombre Padre/Tutor],Nombre_madre as [Nombre Madre], Numero_Contacto as [Numero Contacto],Numero_Contacto2 as [Numero Contacto 2], Direccion, Fecha_Nacimiento as [Fecha Nac.], Id_curso FROM Students where Nombre_Completo+Nombre_padre_tutor+Nombre_madre+Numero_Contacto+Numero_Contacto2 like '%'+@letra+'%' end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[mostrar_Usuarios] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[mostrar_Usuarios] @letra varchar(max) As Select top 500 * FROM Usuarios where Nombre + Usuario + Correo Like '%'+ @letra +'%'
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarConteoGeneral] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarConteoGeneral] as select AsistenciaCurso.Fecha,Cursos.Nombre_Curso ,AsistenciaCurso.Cant_nino,AsistenciaCurso.Cant_nina from AsistenciaCurso inner join Cursos on Cursos.IdCurso = AsistenciaCurso.IdGrado
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarDatosLicencia] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarDatosLicencia] as select * from Activacion
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarDetalleNoAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarDetalleNoAsistio] @Idasistencia int as select Count(*) as Valor from DetalleNoAsistio where IdAsistencia = @Idasistencia
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarDetalleSiAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarDetalleSiAsistio] @Idasistencia int as select count(*) as Valor from DetalleSiAsistio where IdAsistencia = @Idasistencia
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarDispositivosConectados] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarDispositivosConectados] as select * from Dispositivos where Estado = 'CONFIRMADO'
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarDispositivosEspera] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarDispositivosEspera] as select * from Dispositivos where Estado = 'ESPERA'
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarEmpresa] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarEmpresa] as select * from Empresa
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarEstadoSolicitud] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarEstadoSolicitud] @serial varchar(max) as select Estado from Dispositivos where Serial = @serial
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarEstuadiante] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarEstuadiante] @IdCurso int as begin select * from Students where Id_curso =@IdCurso end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarEstudiantesPorGrado] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarEstudiantesPorGrado] @Idgrado int as select Id_Estudiante,Nombre_Completo as [Nombre],Nombre_padre_tutor AS[Padre], Numero_Contacto as[Numero],Fecha_Nacimiento as[Fecha] from Students where Id_curso = @Idgrado
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarIconoPorUsuario] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarIconoPorUsuario] @Idusuario int as select Icono from Usuarios where IdUsuario = @Idusuario
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarIdAsistenciaEditar] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarIdAsistenciaEditar] @idCurso int, @Fecha date as select IdAsistencia from AsistenciaEstudiantes where Idgrado = @idCurso AND Fecha = @Fecha
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarIdAsistenciaFechaGrado] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarIdAsistenciaFechaGrado] @Idgrado int , @fecha date as select IdAsistencia from AsistenciaEstudiantes where Idgrado = @Idgrado and Format(Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') = @fecha GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarInformacionEmpresa] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarInformacionEmpresa] as select * from Empresa
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarInformeActividad] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarInformeActividad] @fi varchar(max) AS BEGIN
--Declaracion Id Niveles DECLARE @IdNivelInicial int = (SELECT IdNivel FROM Niveles WHERE Nombre_Nivel = 'INICIAL') DECLARE @IdNivelPrimaria int = (SELECT IdNivel FROM Niveles WHERE Nombre_Nivel = 'PRIMARIA') DECLARE @IdNivelSecundaria int = (SELECT IdNivel FROM Niveles WHERE Nombre_Nivel = 'SECUNDARIA')
--Obtencion datos inscritos
--Obtencion de inscritos de nivel inicial DECLARE @TotalInscritosNivelInicial int = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students INNER JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = Students.Id_curso INNER JOIN Niveles ON Niveles.IdNivel = Cursos.Idnivel WHERE Niveles.IdNivel = @IdNivelInicial)
--Obtencion de inscritos de nivel primario DECLARE @TotalInscritosNivelPrimario int = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students INNER JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = Students.Id_curso INNER JOIN Niveles ON Niveles.IdNivel = Cursos.Idnivel WHERE Niveles.IdNivel = @IdNivelPrimaria)
--Obtencion de inscritos de nivel secundario DECLARE @TotalInscritosNivelSecundario int = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students INNER JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = Students.Id_curso INNER JOIN Niveles ON Niveles.IdNivel = Cursos.Idnivel WHERE Niveles.IdNivel = @IdNivelSecundaria)
--Total Inscritos en el centro educativo DECLARE @TotalInscritoCentroEducativo int = (@TotalInscritosNivelInicial + @TotalInscritosNivelPrimario + @TotalInscritosNivelSecundario)
--Total Presentes nivel inicial
DECLARE @PresentesNivelInicial int = ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Cant_nina + Cant_nino) FROM AsistenciaCurso INNER JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = AsistenciaCurso.IdGrado INNER JOIN Niveles ON Niveles.IdNivel = Cursos.Idnivel WHERE Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha, 'dd/MM/yyyy') = @fi AND Niveles.IdNivel = @IdNivelInicial) , 0)
--Total Presentes NIVEL Primario
DECLARE @PresentesNivelPrimario int = ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Cant_nina + Cant_nino) FROM AsistenciaCurso INNER JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = AsistenciaCurso.IdGrado INNER JOIN Niveles ON Niveles.IdNivel = Cursos.Idnivel WHERE Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha, 'dd/MM/yyyy') = @fi AND Niveles.IdNivel = @IdNivelPrimaria) , 0)
--Total Presentes NIVEL Secundario
DECLARE @PresentesNivelSecundario int = ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Cant_nina + Cant_nino) FROM AsistenciaCurso INNER JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = AsistenciaCurso.IdGrado INNER JOIN Niveles ON Niveles.IdNivel = Cursos.Idnivel WHERE Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha, 'dd/MM/yyyy') = @fi AND Niveles.IdNivel = @IdNivelSecundaria) , 0)
--Total Presentes Por todos los niveles
DECLARE @TotalPresentes int = (@PresentesNivelInicial + @PresentesNivelPrimario + @PresentesNivelSecundario)
---Ausentes
--Ausentes Nivel Inicial DECLARE @AusentesNivelInicial int = @TotalInscritosNivelInicial - @PresentesNivelInicial
--Ausentes Nivel Primario DECLARE @AusentesNivelPrimario int = @TotalInscritosNivelPrimario - @PresentesNivelPrimario
--Ausentes Nivel Secundario DECLARE @AusentesNivelSecundario int = @TotalInscritosNivelSecundario - @PresentesNivelSecundario
--Total Ausentes
DECLARE @TotalAusentes int = (@AusentesNivelInicial + @AusentesNivelPrimario + @AusentesNivelSecundario)
SELECT @TotalInscritosNivelInicial AS [Inscritos Nivel Inicial], @TotalInscritosNivelPrimario AS [Inscritos Nivel Primario], @TotalInscritosNivelSecundario AS [Inscritos Nivel Secundario], @TotalInscritoCentroEducativo AS [Total Inscritos], ISNULL(@PresentesNivelInicial, 0) AS [Presentes Nivel Inicial], ISNULL(@PresentesNivelPrimario, 0) AS [Presentes Nivel Primario], ISNULL(@PresentesNivelSecundario, 0) AS [Presentes Nivel Secundario], ISNULL(@TotalPresentes, 0) AS [Total Presentes], ISNULL(@AusentesNivelInicial, 0) AS [Ausentes Nivel Inicial], ISNULL(@AusentesNivelPrimario, 0) AS [Ausentes Nivel Primario], ISNULL(@AusentesNivelSecundario, 0) AS [Ausentes Nivel Secundario], ISNULL(@TotalAusentes, 0) AS [Total Ausetes]
END GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarInformeAsistieronYNo] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarInformeAsistieronYNo] @fi date, @ff date as declare @cantidadAsistieron int declare @cantidadNOAsistieron int begin set @cantidadAsistieron = (select COUNT(*) from DetalleSiAsistio inner join AsistenciaEstudiantes on AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia = DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia where AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha >= @fi and AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha <= @ff)
set @cantidadNOAsistieron = (select COUNT(*) from DetalleNoAsistio inner join AsistenciaEstudiantes on AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia = DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia where AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha >= @fi and AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha <= @ff) end select @cantidadAsistieron as Cantsi,@cantidadNOAsistieron as Cantno
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarNombreGradoPorId] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarNombreGradoPorId] @Idgrado int as select Nombre_Curso from Cursos where IdCurso = @Idgrado
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarReporteConteoNivelInicial] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarReporteConteoNivelInicial] @fi date, @ff date as begin
SELECT Nombre_Curso as Nivel,Cant_nino as Masculino,Cant_nina as Femenino,(Cant_nina + Cant_nino) as Total FROM AsistenciaCurso INNER JOIN Cursos ON AsistenciaCurso.IdGrado = Cursos.IdCurso INNER JOIN Niveles ON Cursos.Idnivel = Niveles.IdNivel WHERE Nombre_Nivel = 'INICIAL' AND Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') >= @fi AND Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') <= @ff end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarReporteConteoNivelPrimaria] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarReporteConteoNivelPrimaria] @fi date, @ff date as begin
SELECT Nombre_Curso as Nivel,Cant_nino as Masculino,Cant_nina as Femenino,(Cant_nina + Cant_nino) as Total FROM AsistenciaCurso INNER JOIN Cursos ON AsistenciaCurso.IdGrado = Cursos.IdCurso INNER JOIN Niveles ON Cursos.Idnivel = Niveles.IdNivel WHERE Nombre_Nivel = 'PRIMARIA' AND Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') >= @fi AND Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') <= @ff end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarReporteConteoNivelSecundaria] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarReporteConteoNivelSecundaria] @fi date, @ff date as begin
SELECT Nombre_Curso AS Nivel, Cant_nino AS Masculino, Cant_nina AS Femenino, (Cant_nina + Cant_nino) AS Total FROM AsistenciaCurso INNER JOIN Cursos ON AsistenciaCurso.IdGrado = Cursos.IdCurso INNER JOIN Niveles ON Cursos.Idnivel = Niveles.IdNivel WHERE Nombre_Nivel = 'SECUNDARIA' AND Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') >= @fi AND Format(AsistenciaCurso.Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') <= @ff end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarSiEsAceptadoElDispositivo] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[MostrarSiEsAceptadoElDispositivo] @serial varchar(max) as if exists (select * from Dispositivos where Serial = @serial and Estado = 'CONFIRMADO') select * from Dispositivos where Serial = @serial and Estado = 'CONFIRMADO' else raiserror('NO',18,5)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarStudentsNoAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarStudentsNoAsistio] @IdAsistencia int as select DetalleNoAsistio.IdStudents, Students.Nombre_Completo, Students.Fecha_Nacimiento,DetalleNoAsistio.Excusa from DetalleNoAsistio INNER JOIN Students on Students.Id_Estudiante = DetalleNoAsistio.IdStudents where DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia = @IdAsistencia
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarStudentsSIAsistio] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarStudentsSIAsistio] @IdAsistencia int as select DetalleSiAsistio.IdStudents, Students.Nombre_Completo, Students.Fecha_Nacimiento from DetalleSiAsistio INNER JOIN Students on Students.Id_Estudiante = DetalleSiAsistio.IdStudents where DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia = @IdAsistencia
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarSumatoriaEstudiantesGrado] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarSumatoriaEstudiantesGrado] as select Cursos.IdCurso,Count(Students.Id_Estudiante) as TotalEstudiantes from Cursos inner join Students on Students.Id_curso = Cursos.IdCurso group by Cursos.IdCurso
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarTodasAsistencias] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarTodasAsistencias] as select top 2000 * from AsistenciaEstudiantes
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarTodasAsistenciasFecha] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[MostrarTodasAsistenciasFecha] @fi date, @ff date as select top 2000 * from AsistenciaEstudiantes where Format(Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy')>= @fi and Format(Fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') <= @ff GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[MostrarUsuarioPorId] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[MostrarUsuarioPorId] @id int as select * from Usuarios where IdUsuario = @id
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Obtener_conteo_asistencia_existencia] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Obtener_conteo_asistencia_existencia] @fecha date, @idgrado int as begin select * from AsistenciaCurso where Fecha = @fecha and IdGrado = @idgrado end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Obtener_UltimoIdasistencia] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Obtener_UltimoIdasistencia] as begin select max(IdAsistencia) from AsistenciaEstudiantes end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Reporte_MostrarEstudiantesGrado] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Reporte_MostrarEstudiantesGrado] @Idgrado int as begin Select s.Nombre_Completo as Nombre,s.Nombre_padre_tutor as Padre, s.Numero_Contacto as Numero,s.Fecha_Nacimiento as Fecha from Students as s where Id_curso = @Idgrado end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Reporte_MostrarInformacionEmpresa] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Reporte_MostrarInformacionEmpresa] as select Nombre,Direccion,Telefono,Lema from Empresa
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Reporte_SumarEstudiantesGrado] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create PROC [dbo].[Reporte_SumarEstudiantesGrado] @Idgrado int as begin Select Count(*) from Students where Id_curso = @Idgrado end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[ReporteAsistenciaEstudianteAusentes] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE procedure [dbo].[ReporteAsistenciaEstudianteAusentes] @Idasistencia int as select Students.Nombre_Completo AS Nombre, Excusa, Students.Fecha_Nacimiento from DetalleNoAsistio inner join Students on Students.Id_Estudiante = DetalleNoAsistio.IdStudents where DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia =@Idasistencia
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[ReporteAsistenciaEstudiantePresente] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE procedure [dbo].[ReporteAsistenciaEstudiantePresente] @Idasistencia int as select Students.Nombre_Completo AS Nombre, Students.Fecha_Nacimiento from DetalleSiAsistio inner join Students on DetalleSiAsistio.IdStudents = Students.Id_Estudiante where DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia = @Idasistencia
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[ReporteMostrarAsistenciaGeneral] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[ReporteMostrarAsistenciaGeneral] as SELECT Cursos.Nombre_Curso AS Grado, COUNT(DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia) AS Presentes, COUNT(DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia) AS Ausentes
FROM AsistenciaEstudiantes LEFT JOIN DetalleNoAsistio ON DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia = AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia
LEFT JOIN DetalleSiAsistio ON DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia = AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia
LEFT JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdGrado
GROUP BY Cursos.Nombre_Curso
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[ReporteMostrarAsistenciaGeneralFecha] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[ReporteMostrarAsistenciaGeneralFecha] @fi date, @ff date as SELECT Cursos.Nombre_Curso AS Grado, COUNT(DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia) AS Presentes, COUNT(DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia) AS Ausentes
FROM AsistenciaEstudiantes LEFT JOIN DetalleNoAsistio ON DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia = AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia
LEFT JOIN DetalleSiAsistio ON DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia = AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia
LEFT JOIN Cursos ON Cursos.IdCurso = AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdGrado
where AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha>=@fi and AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha<= @ff GROUP BY Cursos.Nombre_Curso
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Saber_Existe_Asistencia] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Saber_Existe_Asistencia] @fecha date, @Idgrado int as declare @resultado varchar(max) begin if exists (select * from AsistenciaEstudiantes where Idgrado = @Idgrado AND Fecha = @fecha) set @resultado = 'SI' ELSE set @resultado = '-' end SELECT @resultado
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[SumarCantAsistieronConteo] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[SumarCantAsistieronConteo] @fi date, @ff date as select SUM(Cant_nino + Cant_nina) from AsistenciaCurso where AsistenciaCurso.Fecha >= @fi and AsistenciaCurso.Fecha <= @ff
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[SumarCantExcusas] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[SumarCantExcusas] @fi date , @ff date as begin select Count (*) from DetalleNoAsistio inner join AsistenciaEstudiantes on AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia = DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia where AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha >= @fi and AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha <= @ff and DetalleNoAsistio.Excusa <> '-' end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[SumarStudentsNOAsistieron] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[SumarStudentsNOAsistieron] @fi date , @ff date as begin select Count (*) from DetalleNoAsistio inner join AsistenciaEstudiantes on AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia = DetalleNoAsistio.IdAsistencia where AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha >= @fi and AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha <= @ff end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[SumarStudentsNoAsistieronCONTEO] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[SumarStudentsNoAsistieronCONTEO] @fi date , @ff date as declare @total_student int = (select count(*) from Students) begin select (sum(AsistenciaCurso.Cant_nina + AsistenciaCurso.Cant_nino) - @total_student) as total from AsistenciaCurso where Fecha >= @fi and Fecha <= @ff end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[SumarStudentsSIAsistieron] Script Date: 24/6/2022 10:09:23 a. m. ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[SumarStudentsSIAsistieron] @fi date , @ff date as begin select Count (*) from DetalleSiAsistio inner join AsistenciaEstudiantes on AsistenciaEstudiantes.IdAsistencia = DetalleSiAsistio.IdAsistencia where AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha >= @fi and AsistenciaEstudiantes.Fecha <= @ff end
GO USE [master] GO ALTER DATABASE [SisCob] SET READ_WRITE GO
